actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to temporarily suspend for the sole and specific purpose of permitting the United States Capitol Preservation Commission and its designated agents to conduct activities in accordance with the purposes of the Commission on such dates and times, and in such manner as determined by the Senate Co-chair of the Commission or his designee.

summary.text: Suspends specified provisions of Rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the U.S. Capitol to permit the U.S. Capitol Preservation Commission and its designated agents to conduct certain activities.

titles.title: A resolution to temporarily suspend for the sole and specific purpose of permitting the United States Capitol Preservation Commission and its designated agents to conduct activities in accordance with the purposes of the Commission on such dates and times, and in such manner as determined by the Senate Co-chair of the Commission or his designee.
